column3: You can return to a previous commit in git with git reset HEAD~ --hard, and push that again using git push origin -f master. The pull request will automatically adapt.\n
Thanks! now it's back to one commit (uhm, sorry for pressing the open/close buttons, that goes too easy!)\n
ACK, looks good to me.  We need to move off of headers.h and this looks like a good first step (plus if it helps with QT compat, and we do eventually move there, Im in favor)\n
Compiles and runs fine. This is a nice step towards cleaning up the code. ACK\n
ACK, good idea.  I'm going to pull.\n
